import React from 'react'; import { ChevronRight, FileText, DollarSign, Target, ChevronUp, Eye } from 'lucide-react'; export const ParentCard = ({ card, isSeen, onBottomSheet, onSwitchArchetype, onViewEmail, onCustomizeAction }) => { const displayInfo = card.kid || card.sender || { name: 'User', initial: 'U' }; return (
{card.metaCTA}
{displayInfo.initial}

{displayInfo.name}

{card.timeAgo}

{card.priority === 'critical' && (
CRITICAL
)} {card.priority === 'high' && (
HIGH
)}

{card.title}

{card.summary}

{card.requiresSignature && (
Signature Required
Auto-fill ready
)} {card.hpa && (
Recommended Action
{card.hpa}
)}
); }; export const BusinessCard = ({ card, isSeen, onBottomSheet, onSwitchArchetype, onViewEmail, onCustomizeAction }) => { const displayInfo = card.company || card.sender || card.project || card.source || { name: 'Business', initials: 'B' }; const showMetrics = card.value && card.probability && card.score; return (
{card.metaCTA}
{displayInfo.initials || displayInfo.initial}

{displayInfo.name}

{card.timeAgo}

{card.priority === 'critical' && (
HOT
)} {card.priority === 'high' && (
HIGH
)} {card.priority === 'medium' && (
WARM
)}

{card.title || card.summary}

{card.summary && card.title && (

{card.summary}

)} {showMetrics && (
{card.score}
Lead Score
{card.value}
Deal Value
{card.probability}%
Close Rate
)} {card.hpa && (
Recommended Action
{card.hpa}
)}
); }; export const ShoppingCard = ({ card, isSeen, onBottomSheet, onSwitchArchetype, onViewEmail }) => { const storeName = card.store || card.airline || card.service || 'Store'; const showPricing = card.salePrice && card.originalPrice; return (
{card.metaCTA}
{storeName}
{card.priority === 'high' && (
HOT DEAL
)} {card.priority === 'critical' && (
URGENT
)} {card.urgent && (
{card.expiresIn}
)} {card.security && (
SECURITY
)}
{card.productImage && (
{card.productImage}
)}

{card.title}

{card.summary && (

{card.summary}

)} {showPricing && (
${card.salePrice}
${card.originalPrice}
SAVE ${(card.originalPrice - card.salePrice).toFixed(2)}
)} {card.hpa && (
Recommended Action
{card.hpa}
)}
); };
